question: Is invasion and metastasis one of the hallmarks of cancer?
ideal_answer: Yes, invasion and metastasis are one of the so-called hallmarks of cancer.

snippets.text: The pathogenesis of MM involves the accumulation of extensive cytogenetic changes, as well as cancer-related phenotypic alterations that facilitate tumor cell survival, invasion and metastasis. This review presents current knowledge regarding the biological characteristics of this disease that are linked to the so-called hallmarks of cancer.
